      • compare

        public static boolean compare(java.lang.Object lhs,
                              java.lang.Object rhs,
                              java.lang.String operator)
        Compare two objects. lhs and rhs must be of the same type (Number, Boolean, String or Code) Numbers are converted to double prior to comparison. Supported operators are: <, <=, ==, >=, >, !=, is nil, is not nil. Only lhs is checked for is nil and is not nil.

      • parseDateRange

        public static org.apache.commons.lang3.Range<java.lang.Long> parseDateRange(java.lang.String range)
                                                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parse a range of Synthea timestamps (milliseconds since the epoch) from a String. The string can be in one of two formats:

        "milliseconds start-milliseconds end" example: "1599264000000-1627948800000" or "ISO date start-ISO date end" example: "2020-09-05-2021-08-03"

        If using the ISO date format, the time range will be from the start of the day at the beginning of the range until the end of the day for the last day of the range.

        Parameters:
        range - String containing the range
        Returns:
        A Range with the min and max set to Synthea timestamps, longs containing milliseconds since the epoch
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the string is not in one of the expected formats

      • readResource

        public static final java.lang.String readResource(java.lang.String filename)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Read the entire contents of a file in resources into a String.
        Parameters:
        filename - Path to the file, relative to src/main/resources.
        Returns:
        The entire text contents of the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any error occurs reading the file

      • readResourceAndStripBOM

        public static final java.lang.String readResourceAndStripBOM(java.lang.String filename)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Read the entire contents of a file in resources into a String and strip the BOM if present. This method is intended for use when reading CSV files that may have been created by spreadsheet programs that sometimes automatically add a BOM though it could also be used for any other type of file that may optionally include a BOM.
        Parameters:
        filename - Path to the file, relative to src/main/resources.
        Returns:
        The entire text contents of the file minus the leading BOM if present.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any error occurs reading the file

      • randomDicomUid

        public static java.lang.String randomDicomUid(RandomNumberGenerator random,
                                              long time,
                                              int seriesNo,
                                              int instanceNo)
        Generate a random DICOM UID to uniquely identify an ImagingStudy, Series, or Instance. Optionally add series and/or instance numbers to the UID to enhance its uniqueness. Pass 0 for the series/instance number to omit it from the UID.
        Returns:
        a String DICOM UID

                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Walk the directory structure of the modules, and apply the given function for every module.
        Parameters:
        action - Action to apply for every module. Function signature is (topLevelModulesFolderPath, currentModulePath) -> {...}
        Throws:
